list.title: Activity
list.description: Component that displays a chart showing daily activity.

list.description: Creates the user's performances data.

list.description: Displays a custom legend for a chart.

list.description: Displays a custom tooltip for a chart.

list.description: Component that displays a chart showing the average sessions.

list.description: Displays a custom legend for a chart.

list.title: AverageSession~TooltipSession
list.description: Displays a custom tooltip for a chart.

list.description: Creates the user's average sessions data.

Component that displays the 404 Not Found Error
No props

Component that displays the header (logo and main top navbar menu)
No props

list.description:
Component that displays the Home page
No props

list.title: Hooks
list.description: Component hook useGet that uses axios to fetch the data from the API backend or mocked

list.description:
Component that displays the navigation bar on the left

list.title: Loader

Component that display the spinning wheel while waiting for datas to be fetched

list.title: MockedAPI
list.description: Manage the launch of the mocked api using miragejs library

list.description: Create a mocked server to mock an api using miragejs libray

list.title: MockedAPI.error404
list.description: Sends a fake 404 error from the mocked API

list.title: MockedAPI.userExists
list.description: Check if the user exists before calling the mocked API

list.title: Perfomance
list.description: Component that displays a chart showing performances of the user.

list.description: Performances data of the user

list.title: Perfomance~LegendPerf
list.description: Displays the performances legends around the radarchart.

list.description: Creates the user's performances data.

list.title: User
list.description: Component that displays the user's dashboard and datas

list.title: User.propTypes.pageName
list.description: User element to display. Dashboard by default

list.title: UserInfoData
list.description: Creates the user's informations and key datas.

list.title: module:Config
list.description:
File : config
Manages the configuration settings for the application
URL of the backend server
Translations of the performances categories
Demo userId
Days of the week

list.title: module:Data
list.description: Module needed to mocked api data

list.title: module:Data~USER_ACTIVITY
list.description: Users activity

list.title: module:Data~USER_AVERAGE_SESSIONS
list.description: Users sessions

list.title: module:Data~USER_MAIN_DATA
list.description: Users main data

list.title: module:Data~USER_PERFORMANCE
list.description: Users performance

list.title: module:MainApp
list.description:
File : index.jsx
Entry point of the app
Contains the router (react-router)
Depending on react app environment variable, starts the mocked API (and get the mocked data)
or call the real backend API (and get the real data)

list.title: useGet.propTypes.url
list.description: URL of the API
